description: This file is a CMake script designed to locate and configure the 'curl' library for use in a CMake-based build. It searches for headers and libraries, handles standard argument processing, and creates an imported target for curl if found.

methods.name: find_path
methods.description: Searches for the specified header file (curl/curl.h) in the include directories.

methods.name: find_library
methods.description: Searches for the curl library files (curl and libcurl).

methods.name: include
methods.description: Includes and executes the specified CMake module (FindPackageHandleStandardArgs).

methods.name: find_package_handle_standard_args
methods.description: Handles the QUIETLY and REQUIRED arguments to find packages, setting CURL_FOUND if successful.

methods.name: mark_as_advanced
methods.description: Marks specified variables as advanced in CMake GUI, hiding them from casual users.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Sets CMake variables for library and include directory paths.

methods.name: add_library
methods.description: Defines an imported library target CURL::libcurl.

methods.name: set_target_properties
methods.description: Sets properties on the imported target, such as location and include directories.

calls: if( CURL_FOUND AND NOT TARGET CURL::libcurl)
